revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: The history of Sir Charles Grandison. : In a series of letters published from the originals, by the editor of Pamela and Clarissa. In seven volumes. By Samuel Richar..."
revision.text: Possibly: The history of Sir Charles Grandison. : In a series of letters published from the originals, by the editor of Pamela and Clarissa. In seven volumes. By Samuel Richardson. (London : Printed for S. Richardson ; And sold by C. Hitch and L. Hawes, in Pater-noster-Row ; By J. and J. Rivington in St. Paul's Church-Yard ; By Andrew Millar, in the Strand ; By R. and J. Dodsley, in Pall-Mall ; and by J. Leake, at Bath, M. DCC. LIV. [1754]) http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/728238922
